title: Michael states Scott is cheap but he is cheap

content.question: Michael states that his friend Scott is cheap. Michael does not realize he himself is cheap. If Scott is not cheap, which of the following defense mechanisms is Michael using?

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
